channel.title: Broken custom item freezing my client and is invisble
channel.description: Ok, i created an ak-47 on my server and i cant wield it, its invisble and when i try to wield it, it just freezes my client. Im pretty sure its my class8 if you can help ill send you the modelID or the actual model and you can send me the right ints. Im a begginer in modeling just to let you know.
